ygData.subject: Re: Powerleveling bards (was Cazic Thule Slain....]
ygData.msgSnippet: Powerleveling anyone can be easily done with a higher (lvl 24 spells I think) druid. They just buff you up some, especially getting their damage shield, then
ygData.messageBody:
Powerleveling anyone can be easily done with a higher (lvl 24 spells I
think) druid. They just buff you up some, especially getting their
damage shield, then heal you while you fight reds. My friend shot up
his guildmate from 8-12 in a few hours...

I witness the last hour of power leveing as I hopped on with my cleric
and helped with the healing... (so its at least partially verified, and
the guy is pretty reliable)
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
